item.title: Perl Weekly Challenge 9
item.description: This will be my first ever blog post ever. Hi there! I decided to blog a bit so that I can write about the process that goes into solving the Perl Weekly Challenge that I recently heard about. I love Perl, challenging myself with programming tasks, and procrastination. It all works out! So this post will deal with the 9th challenge so far. Check out this challenge, as well as the Perl Weekly Challenge page, here.
